long_description: The Horny Toad Watchdog shirt looks like a dense wool flannel shirt, but pick it up and you'll be surprised by how light it is. Put it on and you'll be impressed by how warm it is. Soft hollow-core polyester is not only incredibly light, it also traps body heat to keep you warm on cold days; fabric dries fast. The Horny Toad Watchdog shirt has 2 button-flap chest pockets.
